update() - Static method in class ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp.Weather

Update() - Method in class ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp.WeatherJSON

Url - Variable in class ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp.WeatherJSON

UserPreferences - Class in ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp
This class allows the applet to remember the user's preferences (such as displaying temperature in Celsius) after the program has been terminated, which can then be restored once the applet is reopened.
UserPreferences() - Constructor for class ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team3.WeatherApp.UserPreferences
sets the program defaults.
